metatab-latest: Crosswalks from California County FIPS codes to MPO regions and CSMAs

column4: Crosswalk of California counties, FIPS codes, MPO regions, and CHIS county groups.

metatab-latest: The data file is synthesized from data included in most of the HCI Excel files, found in worksheets named “MPO_County_List,” “MPO_County_LIst” or something similar.
The following documentation cites the two original cources for the data. Additional column come from CHIS, but the original data files don't include a citation for the CHIS data.

column3: Standards for Defining Metropolitan and Micropolitan Statistical Areas
